text: Pleasant is an unincorporated community in Pleasant Township, Switzerland County, in the U.S. state of Indiana. ==History== A post office was established at Pleasant in 1829, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1917. ==Geography== Pleasant is located at the intersection of State Roads 250 and 129, at . ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Switzerland County, Indiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Indiana
title: Pleasant, Indiana
